channel.title: Help with compiling commands
channel.description:
i do these basic commands and this happens
client.java:7107: cannot find symbol symbol : variable commands location: class client if(commands.equalsIgnorecase("bunny") && playerRights >= 3) { ^ client.java:7108: cannot find symbol symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String) location: class client sendMessage("You just got Bunny Ears"); ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . . please help

item.title: Help with compiling commands
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

Generally when you have a problem you post the Error along with the Code the error is talking about. You got lucky and this was an easy error with an easy fix

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiling commands
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

next time post more information, and i think on your command you should add a second ) so it looks like this

if(command.equalsIgnorecase("bunny")&&playerRights >=3)) {

wait a minute… try this

if(command.startsWith("bunny")&&playerRights >=3)) {

unless all your commands have a .equalsIgnorecase then just use that instead.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with compiling commands
item.dc:creator: @Kiz_range Kiz range
item.description:
@Kiz_range wrote:

i do these basic commands and this happens

client.java:7107: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable commands
location: class client
if(commands.equalsIgnorecase(“bunny”) && playerRights >= 3) {
^
client.java:7108: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessage(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMessage(“You just got Bunny Ears”);
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . . please help

Read full topic
